sentences.en: Buchanan pushed all the right buttons, appealing to Maher's loyalty and to his guilt.
sentences.cn: 布坎南通过激发马厄的忠心和负罪感得到了他想要的东西。

sentences.en: By appealing to his better nature, we persuaded him to change his mind.
sentences.cn: 我们唤醒了他的良知, 劝他改变了主意.

sentences.en: He went over the heads of union officials, appealing directly to the workforce.
sentences.cn: 他越过工会领导, 直接向全体员工发出呼吁.

sentences.en: I find his manner very appealing.
sentences.cn: 我发现他的举止非常有吸引力.

sentences.en: In appealing the case again , you will just be kicking against the pricks.
sentences.cn: 你在上诉, 那简直就是自讨苦吃.

sentences.en: It creates an atmosphere which visitors find so appealing .
sentences.cn: 它创造了一种吸引游客的氛围。

sentences.en: She gave him a soft appealing look that would have melted solid ice.
sentences.cn: 她恳求地看了他一眼，温柔的眼神足以融化坚冰。

sentences.en: She had an appealing flirty smile.
Spending the holidays in Britain wasn't a prospect that I found particularly appealing.
sentences.cn: 在英国度假对我并不特别有吸引力。

sentences.en: The city offers an appealing combination of sporting and cultural events.
sentences.cn: 这座城市集体育活动和文化活动于一身，颇具吸引力。

sentences.en: The large salary made their offer even more appealing to him.
sentences.cn: 高薪使他们的提议对他更具吸引力.

sentences.en: The two players are appealing against their suspensions.
sentences.cn: 这两名运动员请求取消对他们的停赛处罚。

sentences.en: The very compactness of the cottage made it all the more snug and appealing.
sentences.cn: 正是村舍的小巧紧凑让其更为温暖舒适，也更有吸引力。

sentences.en: There are no legal impediments to their appealing against the decision.
sentences.cn: 他们对这一决定提出上诉不会遇到法律障碍.

sentences.en: There was a sense of humour to what he did that I found very appealing.
sentences.cn: 他举手投足间流露出一种幽默感，我觉得很有魅力。

sentences.en: We advocate solving international dispute by negotiation, instead of appealing to arms.
sentences.cn: 我们主张通过协商解决国际争端, 而不主张诉诸武力.

sentences.en: Why do intelligent people find quack remedies so appealing?
sentences.cn: 为什么聪明人会被江湖医术所吸引？
